sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.WPTaskUtilsSNC</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>WPTaskUtilsSNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var WPTaskUtilsSNC = Class.create();
WPTaskUtilsSNC.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    /**
     * Validate expected start and due date
     * @param {GlideRecord} - workplaceTaskGr
     * @return {String} - Translated ErrorMessage 
     */
    validateExpectedStartAndDueDate: function(workplaceTaskGr) {
        var errorMessage = "";
        if (workplaceTaskGr.expected_start > workplaceTaskGr.due_date) {
            errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Expected start can not be after Due date");
        }
        return errorMessage;
    },
	
	/**
	 * Moves all the WSD Cases to cancelled state and tasks to closed skipped when the associated Parent Task is cancelled 
	 * @param {String} parentTaskID - sysId of the Parent Task
	 */
	cancelWorkplaceTasksAssociatedToParentTask : function(parentTaskID) {
		var wsdTaskGr = new GlideRecord(WPConstants.TABLES.WORKPLACE_TASK);
		wsdTaskGr.addQuery('parent',parentTaskID);
		wsdTaskGr.addActiveQuery();
		wsdTaskGr.query();
		if(wsdTaskGr.getRowCount() > 0) {
			wsdTaskGr.setValue('state',WPConstants.WORKPLACE_TASK_STATE.CLOSED_SKIPPED);
			wsdTaskGr.updateMultiple();
		}
	},

    type: 'WPTaskUtilsSNC'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-04-13 15:25:58</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>39169cb7a3ca21105eef6d8246fcda31</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>WPTaskUtilsSNC</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">a208b07253201010b10bddeeff7b1281</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="">a208b07253201010b10bddeeff7b1281</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_39169cb7a3ca21105eef6d8246fcda31</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-11-15 13:10:03</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
